title: Otkrity Mir - Open World
description: Serves meat, veg options available. This cafe is situated in the yoga center Open World (in the same territory with children center "Dom Oranjevoy Korovi" / the Orange Cow's House. Serves mostly Indian cuisine like dahl, etc., some dishes contain dairy however, so vegans inquire. There is a shop selling packaged vegan and healthy food, yoga books, music, exotic music instruments, and more.
